name: Introduction to Film and Video
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creating a film and video, including the history, techniques, and technologies used in the industry.

name: Introduction to Cinematography
description: This course introduces students to the art of cinematography, focusing on the types and functions of camera equipment, lighting, and digital video editing.

name: Storytelling for Film and Video
description: This course focuses on the art of storytelling, exploring the narrative techniques used in film and video production.

name: Advanced Cinematography
description: This course explores advanced cinematography techniques, such as the use of slow motion, color correction, and visual effects.

name: Post-Production and Distribution
description: This course covers the post-production and distribution of films and videos, including editing, mixing, and marketing.
